column5: Well, CANADIAN COPPER and I had planned to fish on Tuesday, but we decided on Monday night.  I thought he was crazy because he was out from Sunday 7pm until 2pm yesterday!!  Anyhow, CC, bly and I headed to a spot for some night fishing, but the only fish caught was a carp by CC!!! It was a little maddening, because you could hear and see the big steelies breaking the surface all night long!!!  Well, after a while, we took CC home...poor guy was a little tired...WIMP!! LOL.  Bly and I headed to another trib and decided to drift there for a few hours.  On my fifth drift, I hooked into this beauty female!  Breaking my old PB of 26 3/4" was this 28" drop back hen.  It put up quite the fight, but this was the only fish I had on all night and I didn't want to lose it!!  She was caught on roe...water was gin clear and low.    If you look closely, you can see one single egg dropping from her...pretty cool.  Well, we got in late, but at least one of us caught a fish!
WTG Cliff!  Congrats on your new PB!  Stan

Awesome...and to think you stopped fishing for all those years!!  Glad to see your successes, I think we've all been following your outings since the monster Walleyes last fall.  Keep up the great effort and reports! Tony
Nice fish and big fish, big numbers are expected when you head out with CC! Congrats on the PB
Well done cliff,great new PB...man you are sure catching on the the steelhead fishing methods way to go...cheers

Thanks Tony!  Bly and I have had a LOT of fun re-discovering fishing again.  This board has been fantastic to us in following us along our successes and "learning experiences"...LOL.  We've had lots of support from the great members of this board...it's nice to contribute to it when we can.

NICELY DONE!!! THE HEN MUST OF THOUGHT YOU WERE CUTE AND WAS TRYIN TO SPAWN WITH YA MAYBE CLIFF???LOL  WAS A VERY TUFF NIGHT INDEED!!!ROE BITE SEEMS TO BE OFF SO ITS DAYLIGHT JIGGY TIME I GUESS!!!  BIG NUMBERS NEXT OUTING FOR US BRO!!!MY OTHER SPOT
Congrats on your new Pb and beauty fish wtg!!
WTG on the new PB.... good luck upping that too, your starting to set the bar too high lol... good luck out there
nice colors on that fish
nice job ccmt ( Canadian Copper's Muscle Team) that is one beautiful fish . keep up the good work!!
You're on for next week...gotta figure out which day I'm going to be sick...cough cough....
very nice fish!
You are starting to look a little peeked there CCMT , do you have chronic steell fever.

Beauty fish Cliff nice colours and cool shot of the roe falling.Congrats on your PB.  Fishing Night in Canada on  CBC(CCMT,Bly,Canadian Copper) the trio has done it again.A winning fish in overtime.  Mike the Pike  Trib Gods

Congrats on the new PB!  It's been a lot of fun reading your reports over the past few months and seeing your progress on the trib fishing. Don't be surprised if some OFNCers ask you to take them under your wing on some outings...  Mike
Congrats on the pb Cliff! You sure do have the fever  !
Wow, beauty Cliff! Congrats!
That smile is brighter than the headlights, well done Cliff...
That's a beauty Cliff.  Congrats !
Congrats!
congrats on the new PB!
CCMT that smile looks like you have come across a free cat house. Good on you in bringing it in now for the hard part, beating it again. Nice Job. Peace ken
Sweet fish Cliff.  Right on!  Joey
